entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning early this morning. Snow mixed with ice pellets this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain this afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 21 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Risk of freezing rain this evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Wind becoming west 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
